discover.title: Discover
discover.subtitle: Our restaurant menu
discover.text: In our menu you will find a great variety of delicious food that will satisfy the needs and tastes of everyone. We strive to source the highest quality ingredients for all of our dishes thereby enhancing the quality of services.

products.title: Chicken wings
products.desc: Itâ€™s all about flavour and fun, fun, fun. Toss fried chicken with a finger-licking sauce spiked with chilli and fresh ginger.

products.title: Dumplings
products.desc: Small dumplings filled with spiced lamb. Tossed in a tomato sauce and served with sumac-flavoured Greek yoghurt.

products.title: French onion soup
products.desc: French onion soup is deeply savoury and hearty - and cheesy croutons make it extra special!

products.title: Mini chilli pretzels
products.desc: These freshly-baked savouries beat anything out of a packet.

products.title: Atlantic Salmon
products.desc: Have dinner on the table super fast with clever shortcuts and this easy salmon and Greek rice salad.

products.title: Fish tacos
products.desc: Fish is a healthy, low-fat taco filling, and it tastes absolutely delicious.

products.title: Sesame Tuna
products.desc: Sesame seeds form a tasty crust and are rich in calcium, copper and magnesium.

products.title: Parmesan chicken
products.desc: This crunchy crumbed chicken tastes fabulous paired with the fresh flavours of zucchini, mint and olives.

products.title: Seared scallops
products.desc: Escape the hustle and bustle with this exotic breakfast that will satisfy your taste buds..

products.title: Poached salmon
products.desc: Decidedly gourmet poached salmon dish with a zingy watercress mayonnaise.

products.title: Green curry
products.desc: This balance of sweet, sour and salty flavours is a hallmark of Thai cooking.

products.title: Lobster salad
products.desc: A simple lobster salad with butter and just a hint of mayonnaise so that you can still taste the sweet lobster meat.

products.title: Chicken & orange salad
products.desc: With juicy oranges and a yoghurt dressing, this chicken salad is a treat on any spring table.

products.title: Winter salad
products.desc: This is a simple winter salad, fresh and crisp.

products.title: Thai-style salad
products.desc: This is a simple winter salad, fresh and crisp.
